MajorClaims.Text: people avoid eating meat mostly for the sake of their health and relegious aspect
people choose to become vegetarians for health and religious concern rather than the benefits of animals

Claims.Text: health improvement is the main reason for vegetarian diet to become so popular
it is vital to follow one's own religious practices which can bring the enlightenment in mind

Premises.Text: Many researchers have convinced that many kinds of vegetable contain antioxydant which can prevent cancer
a vegetable diet can do good for our health
a meal without meat can lead to a lack of protein intake
it is proved that many kinds of bean such as soy bean or pea are also comparable protein sources
eating their meat mean you eat the flesh of your parent sentient beings
Some religion, such as Buddha, believes that animals were human being in their previous life
